extension.summary: openvpn OE7: a full featured SSL VPN software solution that integrates OpenVPN server capabilities.
extension.description: openvpn OE7 binary is installed as /storage/.kodi/addons/network.openvpn/bin/openvpn.
extension.disclaimer: this is an unofficial addon. please don't ask for support in openelec forum / irc channel (XvBMC: OE7).
